parameter.name: subpage_x_position
parameter.documentation: Y-Coordinate of lower left hand corner of subpage in cm. -1 is the default: 7.5% of the parent page

parameter.name: subpage_y_position
parameter.documentation: X-Coordinate of lower left hand corner of subpage in cm. -1 is the default: 5% of the parent page

parameter.name: subpage_x_length
parameter.documentation: Length of subpage in horizontal direction in cm. -1 is the default: 85% of the parent page

parameter.name: subpage_y_length
parameter.documentation: Length of subpage in vertical direction in cm. -1 is the default: 85% of the parent page

parameter.name: subpage_map_projection
parameter.documentation: Projection to set in the drawing area

parameter.name: subpage_y_position_internal
parameter.documentation: X-Coordinate of lower left hand corner of subpage

parameter.name: subpage_x_position_internal
parameter.documentation: Y-Coordinate of lower left hand corner of subpage

parameter.name: subpage_right_position
parameter.documentation: X-Coordinate of lower right hand corner of subpage

parameter.name: subpage_y_length_internal
parameter.documentation: Length of subpage in vertical direction.Default

parameter.name: subpage_x_length_internal
parameter.documentation: Length of subpage in horizontal direction.Default

parameter.name: subpage_top_position
parameter.documentation: Y-Coordinate of upper left hand corner of subpage

parameter.name: subpage_background_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the subpage background

parameter.name: subpage_frame
parameter.documentation: Plot frame around subpage (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: subpage_frame_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of subpage frame (Full choice of colours)

parameter.name: subpage_frame_line_style
parameter.documentation: Style of subpage frame (SOLID/DASH/DOT/CHAIN_DASH/CHAIN_DOT)

parameter.name: subpage_frame_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of subpage frame

parameter.name: subpage_vertical_axis_width
parameter.documentation: width of the vertical axis in cm

parameter.name: subpage_horizontal_axis_height
parameter.documentation: height of the horizontal axis in cm

parameter.name: subpage_map_overlay_control
parameter.documentation: Metview Only: overlay method. always: plot the fields as they come; never: never overlay; by_date/by_level: only overlay data with the same valid date/level

parameter.name: subpage_align_horizontal
parameter.documentation: Used in automatic layout to setup the horizontal alignment of the drawing area in the subpage

parameter.name: subpage_align_vertical
parameter.documentation: Used in automatic layout to setup the vertical alignment of the drawing area in the subpage

parameter.name: subpage_map_json_definition
parameter.documentation: Metview only : store internal information about zooned area

parameter.name: automatic_title
parameter.documentation: Plot the title (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: subpage_map_preview
parameter.documentation: Mv4: turn on/off the generation of the infomation for the preview box

parameter.name: subpage_map_magnifier
parameter.documentation: Mv4: turn on/off the generation of the infomation for the magnifier tool

parameter.name: magnifier_symbol_name
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Symbol used in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_hidden_symbol_name
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Symbol used in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_symbol_colour
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Colour of the symbol in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_hidden_symbol_colour
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Colour of the symbol in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_symbol_height
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Colour of the symbol in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_hidden_symbol_height
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Colour of the symbol in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_text_font_name
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Colour of the symbol in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_text_font_size
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Colour of the symbol in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_text_font_colour
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Colour of the symbol in the magnifier

parameter.name: magnifier_text_format
parameter.documentation: Mv4: Colour of the symbol in the magnifier
